example: Tourists come to see the natural beauty in Australia and New Zealand.
They watch traditional dance performances on the Pacific islands.
Musical instruments are similar in Micronesia and Southeast Asia.
Indigenous people were forced to learn Western culture.
The government of Australia changed its policy to respect indigenous people.
The government began to return land rights to the Aborigines.

kana: しぜんをすうはいする
example: Indigenous cultures worship nature and protect sacred places.
Uluru is a sacred place for the Aboriginal people.
Aborigines had no writing, but they had many wall paintings.
Many Pacific islands became independent after World War II.
